column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/4881353efef81acc6ddbaaecd4ba89f012b3e87e for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK. Tested and code changes look fine to me.\n
I would love to see this in 0.8.2 :).\n

When you have network problems (internet access, proxy) and before a connection could be made to another node. I find it helpful to have that state shown, as it will tell users there is something not working.\n
